    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208970</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Musical Intervals, Frequency, and Ratio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikalische Abstände, Frequenz und Verhältnis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intervalles, fréquence, et taux musicaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Intervalos, freqüência, e relação musicais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intervalli, frequenza e rapporto musicali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσικές διαστήματα, συχνότητα, και αναλογία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intervalos, frecuencia, y relación de 
transformación musicales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For high school and above, a discussion of the relationship of musical intervals and frequency ratios, with examples and exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für High School und oben, eine Diskussion über 
das Verhältnis der musikalischen Abstände und der 
Frequenzverhältnisse, mit Beispielen und Übungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour le lycée et en haut, une discussion du 
rapport des intervalles et des taux musicaux de fréquence, avec des 
exemples et des exercices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para a High School e acima, uma discussão do 
relacionamento de intervalos e de relações musicais da freqüência,
com exemplos e exercícios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la High School e sopra, una discussione sul 
rapporto degli intervalli e dei rapporti musicali di frequenza, con 
gli esempi e le esercitazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για το γυμνάσιο και ανωτέρω, μια συζήτηση της σχέσης 
των μουσικών διαστημάτων και των αναλογιών συχνότητας, με τα 
παραδείγματα και τις ασκήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para la High School secundaria y arriba, una 
discusión del lazo de intervalos y de relaciones de transformación 
musicales de la frecuencia, con ejemplos y ejercicios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
